name: Sargam UI
description:
[Daily Updates] v0.4


Sargam is for creators, founders, designers, engineers, & managers who want to compose, craft and ship high quality designs with speed and scale.


If you like Sargam or want to show your appreciation for me building authentic & thoughtful design resources for you, consider tipping me with a coffee.


Website sargam.design

Twitter @SargamDesign


Built using Sargam:

https://polls.adonisjs.dev/


Love everyone ❤️


Releases

v0.4
- Compositions/Components: Tabs, Inline feedbacks, Breadcrumbs, Pagination 
- Inventory: User Persona (Template), Get started building (Template)



v0.3
- Principles: Helper type styles, grids, shadows variations, iconography
- Compositions/Components: Inputs, Calendars, Checkboxes & Radio (Large), Tabs, Toggle



v0.2

- Compositions: Avatars, Counters, Flags, Pills, Tooltips
- Inventory: Insight Framework



v0.1

- Intial Release, Introduction, Methodology
- Principles: Guiding Principles, Color System, Typography, Shadows
- Compositions: Buttons, Checkboxes, Radio Buttons
